Description: Heavy rains caused severe flooding in low-lying areas of Hyderabad.
Intense rainfall resulted in waterlogging and transportation disruptions.
Public protests led to road closures and traffic disruptions in the city.
Hyderabad faced a major outbreak of the COVID-19 pandemic
A major fire broke out in a market area
An extreme heatwave with temperatures exceeding 46Â°C affected the city.
Heavy monsoon rains caused significant flooding in parts of Hyderabad.
A major traffic accident on a busy highway resulted in casualties.
A sudden hailstorm caused damage to crops and vehicles in the city.
A moderate earthquake with a magnitude of 4.7 shook the city.
